title: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
Add onions and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, and sauté for another minute.
Add potatoes and cauliflower, and stir well to coat with spices.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
Cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking. Add a little water if needed.
Sprinkle with garam masala and garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

title: BBQ BARBECUE CHICKEN
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, mix together olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
Rub the chicken breasts with the spice mixture.
Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Brush with BBQ sauce during the last 2 minutes of grilling.
Remove from grill and let rest for 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with extra BBQ sauce.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes, then drain.
Heat oil in a large pan and fry the sliced onions until golden brown. Set aside half for garnishing.
Add cumin seeds, ginger-garlic paste, and sauté until fragrant.
Add chicken pieces, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Cook until the chicken is browned.
Add tomatoes, yogurt, mint, and coriander leaves. Cook for another 5-7 minutes.
Add garam masala and mix well.
In another pot, boil water and add rice. Cook until 70% done, then drain.
Layer the partially cooked rice over the chicken mixture.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fried onions and serve hot with raita.

title: Chicken Tikka Biryani
instructions: Marinate the chicken pieces with yogurt, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt for 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the sliced onions until golden brown. Set aside half for garnishing.
Add cumin seeds and cook until fragrant.
Add marinated chicken pieces and cook until they are half done.
Add tomatoes, mint, and coriander leaves. Cook for another 5 minutes.
In another pot, boil water and add rice. Cook until 70% done, then drain.
Layer the partially cooked rice over the chicken mixture.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fried onions and serve hot with raita.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala. Add chicken and marinate for 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and cook marinated chicken until fully cooked. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add more oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, and cook for another minute.
Add tomato puree, salt, and cook until the sauce thickens.
Add cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, pickles, and onions for topping
Ketchup, mustard, and mayo for serving
instructions: In a large bowl, mix ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Form into 4 patties.
Preheat a grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook patties for 4-5 minutes per side or until desired doneness.
Top each patty with a slice of cheese and let it melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, patties, and desired toppings.
Serve hot with ketchup, mustard, and mayo.

title: Dal Makhni
instructions: Soak lentils and kidney beans overnight. Drain and rinse.
Cook lentils and beans in a pressure cooker with salt and water until soft.
In a pan, heat butter and add cumin seeds. Let them splutter.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, garam masala, and chili powder. Cook until the oil separates.
Add the cooked lentils and beans. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Rub chicken breasts with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 5-6 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Remove from grill and let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
Top with sliced grilled chicken and drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette.
Serve immediately.

title: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Add fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove from the oven, slice, and serve hot.

title: Veggie Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Add bell peppers, red onion, black olives, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, and spinach leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, oregano, and chili flakes if using.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from the oven, slice, and serve hot.
